actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution appointing a committee to notify the President concerning the proposed adjournment of the session.

summary.text: Provides that a committee of two Senators be appointed by the Presiding officer to join a similar committee of the House of Representatives to notify the President that the Congress has completed its business of the session.

titles.title: A resolution appointing a committee to notify the President concerning the proposed adjournment of the session.
